If you can't find something you can ask anyone and they will help u find it. If they can't find it for you in store they will help you find it online and even help you purchase if you are not computer savy.  They offer a lot in their tool rental department as well.

resp.text: Hello Elysia, thank you for taking the time to let us know how we performed. We value your business and appreciate the feedback.

name: Shane McCandless
text: They don't have dollys available and will act like it is not there problem. Had to spend 30 minutes on phone with customer service to address this issue. Tessa on the phone transferred me without even talking to me. This is absurd. I recommend trying another location or hiring a moving company....less trouble.

name: Kathryn Howard
text: We were supposed to pick up a truck from a different location, self pickup. When we got there and attempted to do it the system told us to go to the desk. That location was closed until TUESDAY!   We went to this location and Brian was able to help us get a truck in a timely fashion and was great about it. He even tried to help cancel the other reservation. Next time we need a truck I will be going to this location and hope Brian will be there again.   Thank you so much Brian.

name: C. Albert Bardi
text: Just returned a trailer that I rented for 24hrs.  I went online and bought the ball that was recommended for my suv/hitch,and a 7-to-4 wire adapter.  When I showed yesterday, the guy was friendly and helpful.  Bummer, but my suv didn’t play nice with the LED adapter I bought at auto zone or even a trailer with LED lights.  Smart dude figured it out right away though, and gave me a little older (no LED) but larger trailer at same rate that worked like a charm.  He also lent me an adapter at no charge!  A different guy helped at drop off and was super friendly.  Great all around.  One word to the wise: my pads and appliance dolly that I reserved didn’t show up on his computer at pick up, and I forgot about them (but lived without them). So if you reserve online you might want to double check that your extras are included when you pay.

name: Taylor M
text: SPARE YOURSELF and visit the location on University Drive (VERY FRIENDLY & HELPFUL). I ended up getting supplies from both locations in preparation for my move however rented a truck from the Governor's drive location. The manager and "assistant mgr" lack customer service skills and any question or request is an inconvenience to them. Upon arrival, they didn't acknowledge my existence in the store. I stood there for 5-10 minutes  while they were on the computer (no one else was in the store). Not even a simple hello, or I'll be right with you. They have no desire to help with an issue or concerns you may have. Furthermore, they put the incorrect return location on the truck which was a huge inconvenience. The University Drive location may be busy, but at least they are friendly and are willing to help.

name: Lee Anna Wright
text: Have been going here to fill up propane.  Today was met with the rudest service ever received anywhere.  After requesting service, he kept saying "I don't know what to tell you".  Ended up saying he didn't want our business.  Never again.  Hoping to contact the owner/manager next week.

name: LaNae R
text: I had a really good experience renting from this location for my out of state move. First, I reserved the wrong size truck. So I had to return to the location for a larger size. They were professional & very accommodating. After the truck was loaded, I returned to the location so they could attach my vehicle tow. Thanks for the great service!

name: Amy Hamlett
text: So disappointed. Made my appointment and paid for it. Tried to call all week, could never get an answer. Showed up for my appointment, the guy at the desk looked shock. Told me he couldn't do it. I live an hour away and took off work to get this done, they didn't even call me! The guy spoke to me like I was nothing and that I inconvenienced him by showing up. Never again going to this horrible place.

name: Jim Keel
text: Staff were deep in maskless conversation with each other while checking in, had me check myself in online. Was given the most dilapidated trailer I've ever received from U-Haul for a 17 hour interstate move. Trailer full of dirt and debris. I realized this trailer doesn't have d-rings on the floor in each corner and requested a trailer that does because the only item I'm hauling is a motorcycle (there were 5 other trailers of the same size lined up beside this one). Agent stated that this is the next trailer on the list to go out so...... I'm stuck pulling a beat trailer 17 hours with an extra hour of set up time to get the bike properly secured using the wall stakes (and hoping they don't fail). I rent from U-Haul somewhat frequently and almost always find outstanding customer service. Disappointed here though

name: Lori Diamond
text:
We had an appointment for two weeks, to have a trailer hitch put on my car. They knew we were out of town, over an hour away, and did not have the COMMON COURTESY to call and let me know that they did not have the parts. I asked when he thought he might have them, he’s response was “I’ve been waiting on something’s since December.”
Bad business!! Be professional and pick up the phone at let someone know something!

name: Bobbie
text: I had a problem with the U Haul on Drake.  I went to the main office on Governors.  They turned my day around.  Thank you guys for your diligent work fixing my problems with a smile.

name: William Lovett
text: They set an appointment for 7:15am, store doesn't open until 8am. when I call to make sure they gave me the right time, they said store is open from 7am-8pm. Then after showing up at 6:55am and waiting until 7:20am. I called and they said they don't open until 8am. Taking my money somewhere else.

name: Jeremy Owen
text: These guys are awsome. Helped me in so many ways. The guys that work behind the counter need a raise.

name: Doris Price
text: Great assistance at Huntsville AL Employee Creed gave excellent customer service.

name: Lianna Pabon
text: This uhaul business location on governor's drive has always been very helpful and I have never had any issues at all with them.  I'll continue to come back to this location as I always have and will recommend them to others also!

name: patton fussell
text:
HORRIBLE! Everything about my experience at this Uhaul location was a nightmare. I rented a trailer and upon taking it back, I shared with the representative that my truck had damage on the back side. He jumped on his phone and FaceTimed his boss while walking around the trailer to see if there was any damage. He could have cared less about my truck. Even so, he says, “no sir there’s no damage.” I had a witness riding with me that saw and heard the whole thing as well. Quickly after that I was rushed out the door to avoid any more questions about my truck. A month later, I receive a $1300 bill for damages to the trailer!!! I was stunned and figured it must have been a mistake.
Upon calling Uhaul corporate office, they told me the general manager was unaware I received a letter with charges and to be expecting a call from him. I did receive a call expecting an apology and info on what they planned on doing for my truck. Instead, he all of a sudden knew all about it(even though he wasn’t even there) and blamed me! I’ve been in a dispute for a month and it has taken so much time and it’s been awful. Do yourself a favor, and DO NOT utilize their services. You’ll regret it.

name: John Eells
text: Got a dirty truck full of leaves and such.  No biggie. The back was a bit dirty too. Mostly things that blew in from trees.  I swept it all out front and back and it was returned much cleaner than I got it.  They bothered to sneak in a $25 cleaning fee.  I’ve never earned a cleaning fee in my life. Luckily I caught it before leaving and they reversed it after about a week. If not for the attempted scam it would have been 4 or 5 stars.

name: Clint F.
text: Installed trailer hitch! They had factory installation instructions issue that took extra time to resolve. Chris credited my account back some money for the extra wait time without even asking. Great service.

name: matt barber
text: Entered the store to purchase moving supplies. No one was at counter. Made my selection while waiting for a representative to show up. About 5 minutes after being in the store with it entirely unattended I walked into the back area-found no one. Another client had since walked in to join the wait. Finally found a maintenance man outside who miraculously found 2 representatives. They never apologized about the wait time. They did not thank me for my patronage. Most importantly, anyone passerby off the street could have stolen a number of things during this entire ordeal. Horrible business practices and terrible customer service.

name: Matthew Wilson
text: I changed my previous one star review because Chris Holman took the time to fix the billing error by sitting down with me.  He impressed me with his helpfulness.  Would have rated higher but I had to take extra time to fix the problem.

name: V Lipscova
text: Came here just to buy a moving blanket or furniture cover -- the ones made out of recycled denim -- and the cashier had to count the entire cash register drawer just to take my cash payment. Very inconvenient. Not sure I'd go here again.

name: Britton Lynn
text:
When I picked up the trailer it was covered in dust and dirt on the inside. Then after I turned it back in I looked at my credit card bill and learned they charged me for $155 worth of boxes, plastic bubble wrap and all sorts of moving supplies??? I called and they told me to talk to customer service after being on the phone then they told me the GM would call me. If you want Uhaul to commit fraud and steal money from you then this is the place to go. I would HIGHLY suggest other locations.

It’s shocking that I never even signed this receipt they emailed me of stuff they charged me for and yet they are still charging me. I mean do they not have cameras to see me walking in and out of the store with no boxes????

name: regina jackson
text: Expected to have been worked with seeing as to though I left five minutes before and my address the bottom flooded and was notified as I’m driving away from the store turned around and asked to return even offered to pay the mileage and gas! But the boss has nothing for you smh

name: Carly D
text: Scheduled a pick up for tomorrow and just called to confirm my pickup. Tammy at governors informed my pickup was moved to Uncle Bobs storage on highway72 west. 1. I was not notified about the location change. 2. I live in South Huntsville. 3. Tammy hung up on me.

name: Ellen Montgomery
text: They gave us a horrible truck,  absolutely no steering!  VERY DANGEROUS! We had to drive from Huntsville, AL to Oceanside, CA!  I am not impressed at all with this company! Check your vehicles before you rent them out for an outrageous price to your customers! Horrible! We are a military family and we will be spreading the word that U-Haul is NOT the company to use or rely on! We are very open minded people,  we don't usually write negative reviews, I hope this helps future personnel and the problem is addressed. Thank you for your time and reviewing this.

name: Jonathan Pongetti
text: Employees were very helpful. No complaints.

name: Scott Chartier
text: Terrible Experience. Didn't have what I rented, staff was rude with no help given, no follow up. Go somewhere else if possible.

name: Amy Freeze
text: I needed propane for our heater tonight. The local place by me didn't have any certified to do it. I had called the s location and they could do it, but I figured I'd got to Tractor Supply and shop too.  I drove to Tractor Supply in Huntsville and THEY also didn't have anyone could do it. Got to the UHaul, not only was the guy very nice and came right out before I barely got out of the car, THEY were .50/gal cheaper then TSC! Great place.

name: Matthew Self
text: I just wanted to contact you to let you know of my experience with two different U-Haul locations in Huntsville, AL on Dec. 31, 2015.  It was such a bad experience that I will never use U-Haul again.  On Dec. 30, 2015 I reserved a pickup truck for rental the following day at the location at 3713 Governor's Drive in Huntsville.  I was scheduled to pick this vehicle up at 11:30am.  I showed up a few minutes early and the location was empty.  A few minutes later, Tammy, the General Manager comes in from the back and informs me that my reservation has been moved to the location across town at 4400 University Drive in Huntsville.  I needed to have the truck in a certain location to pick up some furniture by noon of that day and this was already placing me behind schedule considering that I was never notified in advance of this change.  A few minutes later I arrive at the location on University Drive to attempt my pick up.  While waiting in a line of 5 people, I start to become stressed because it is already 11:45am.  The General Manager at this location, Paulette Boehlke, informs me that it doesn't matter when I was scheduled to pick up this truck.  She states, that I will have to wait in line while she continues taking peoples orders and then going outside to fit them for their truck.  I am a bit in a panic because this is not what I expected considering that I had reserved the truck for a specific pick up time for a reason.  I finally left the location because I could not see it fit to pay U-Haul for the poor job they had done with having my reservation ready for pick up that morning.  All this especially considering they have a sign in office guaranteeing that they will have the truck you order at the right location at the right time available for you.  I cancelled my order with U-Haul and was able to reserve a truck with another moving company.  Tammy, from the first location called while I was on the way to pick up the new truck and tried to get me to come by and pick up a truck that was now there at her location on Governor's Drive.  She claimed that the reason I couldn't pick up the truck at the scheduled time and scheduled location was because the call center had double booked that time.  The pick up that was sitting outside her location when I was their earlier, she said, had been left by someone that had not left their keys with her.  Either way, the whole thing was crap.  I intend to never use U-Haul's services again and will inform people of this issue in the Huntsville locations.

name: B Westfall
text: Dewayne Griggs is the General Manager. Check this location out. Dewayne can handle it. Don't care how busy it is. Efficient and effective.

name: Paul F
text: Decent boxes and selection of moving supplies. But no service. No one answers the phone and I had to wait 10 minutes for the one employee to finish filling propane to check me out. Woefully understaffed.

name: ellen blasi
text: They were incredibly helpful given the fact that the customer service at Uhaul corp. messed everything up.

name: Alex Cain
text: They're good if you need something to move with, reasonable prices. Especially with their competitors.

name: Sara Elkins
text: Love the staff. Got us moved in no time.

name: Tim Rugart
text: They have always been great to me and fixed any problem I have ever Had! Customer  service was great,

name: Andrew G.
text: Worst customer service I have ever had. Moved out of Huntsville to another state, stored our ubox for awhile until my husband and I got settled. Called to get everything set up to get it shipped to us and got the run around from the store manager of all people. Had to call there corporate office multiple times to get anything done, finally after two weeks were getting our stuff. I will never use uhaul again for any reason. And I recommend to everyone on going to any other moving company then this horrible place. Would have given no stars if possible.

name: roy honey
text: The time I was there I was at the store about 2.5 for nothing the lighting wiring didn't work with my 2007 Dodge truck. All time was wasted

name: Waldwinthir Guillim
text: I rented a uhaul last Sunday. I paid 70$ for rental and boxes plus a 100$ deposit. After I returned the truck they took 96$ of my deposit. Monday I called and complained and they refunded me 34$ one day later they ran 4 unauthorized debits on my card for 330$ not happy.

name: Majesti Burroughs
text: The fellas were nice and knowledgeable

name: Coy Bailey
text: Kind of slow. Under staffed

name: Judith Allen
text: Well stocked cleaned friendly

name: Jimmy Graves
text: Horrible service and saying there was damage and there wasn't I wish I could go under a 1

name: Amy Oaks
text: Went there to get a trailer very friendly people

name: Adam Garrett
text: Fantastic service and courtesy

name: Candy Bells
text: Never liked uhaul

name: Frederick Jones
text: very professional...

name: Katrina Smith
text: Service was okay

name: James Hayes
text: Stay away from this place the Uhaul is awful.The people don't care.

name: B Kilgore
text: Good Christian People 😇

name: David Upton
text: Untrustworthy. Will tell you it's there and then send you on a wild goose chase. Just get a metro truck. They will actually get you what they say they will.

name: Joe Knows
text: They will mislead you as to where your rental truck is located and then force you to return to whatever location they made you go to even though it won't be the same location you reserved your truck at and they will make sure its an extremely long way from where ever you selected to pick the truck up from . They will charge you extra has milage from this and also make it an extreme hassle for their customers.

name: Rochelle Baxter
text:
Great service!
Good hours.
Helpful over the phone.
Convenient, yet busy area off of the 280.
Easy pick-up and effortless drop off.
Affordable prices.
No complaints... will def use them again 👍

name: Destiny Woods
text: I called 2 times before coming and waited 15 mins with no answer. I only had a question about how many passengers a cargo van can hold. I decided to stop by the location. No one at the desk. Called a number that was left, it went straight to voicemail 3 times. Found a card for the manager.  I called the office and the manager's cell phone. No answer. Waited for a while. An amazon delivery driver came and got tired of waiting so he left the package on the desk. A worker from a moving company came, got tired of waiting and left. Eventually I left as well. Both doors to the store were open. Someone could have came and taken items. It was pretty ridiculous.

name: Jeff king
text: Nice facility friendly staff

name: Patrice Jones
text: Professional! Able to get what I needed.

name: Madison Dearry
text: Called ahead of time with a reservatuon, the man we spoke with told us he had the exact thing we needed. Which was perfect; however we get there and get through the entire rental process, pull our vehicle over and it's not the right thing. Keep in mind the whole time we were told and thought it was the correct thing. It's hot outside, the customer service from the manger was incredible; she did help us greatly by finding another location close by that had what we needed and even double checked to make sure we didn't waste our time. Props to the beautiful and amazing manger on duty that day, I'd release her name but I don't wanna give out her privacy. It would be amazing if the other employees would step on her level!

name: Tim Chambliss
text: We had an in-town move for one of our daughters and rented a 10' truck. HINT: the truck is the same price as the trailer plus mileage. Pay a little more for a lot less hassle. We got in and out really quickly with no problems. The gent who assisted us was very nice. IF you are coming back down the mountain to return your rental, just pay attention. If you miss the entrance at the Chevron it's quite a task to get back out on 280. Good experience. I hate moving but will use again if needed.

name: Carlton Ivy
text: Walked in and nobody was home. Who leaves a store completely un staffed???? Don't waste your time.

name: Darren Ice
text: Good customer service at the location! (corporate was a nightmare) good sized well kept spaces at a reasonable price!

name: Eli Rodriguez
text: Friendly service, pretty easy to get things done there. Location is great for the Birmingham Area.

name: Robin Lewis
text: We have rented trucks from here several times to pick up or deliver furniture. Good service. The trucks were in good condition. I would rent from this uhaul store again. Very good experience everytime we have used them. They also sell boxes and moving items, you can rent other items you may need. It's an easy location to find, right on The highway 31

name: Stephanie Cook
text: All of the employees are extremely helpful and very friendly. They cary you box purchases to you vehicle. They go above and beyond to make sure you are completely taken care of.

name: Sigmund Sanford
text: Guys are awesome. Helpful with getting supplies needed for individual basis.

name: Charmaine Duke
text: My experience at this Uhaul was great. The ladies there took the time on 2 separate occasions to figure out how to load a bunch of stuff into my MINI Cooper...no small feat! Thanks Cassandra!

name: Alida Pugh
text: The staff is very pleasant and informative.

name: Brittany Perry
text: Paid way more than I expected to. Only one staff member is trained well.

name: makeisha gibson
text: They really helped us as much as they can great customer service they didn't have the size truck that we needed so we got a bigger one for a smaller price

name: Roz T.
text: I visited this location in search of packing tape and material to store bunk beds in. We were taking down bunk beds and needed material to use to store them in our garage. This store had exactly what we needed and at a reasonable price.

name: Katie Parker
text: Awesome friendly staff, quick and painless

name: maxine latham
text: Some of the staff have a problem. And over charge you

name: Andrea Lane
text: I wouldn't use this U-haul location or services! I've contacted this office spoken to numerous people plus customer service about my account no one will help me! But I figured anyway because I'm black!!!

name: Chris Smith
text: Don't know if I was there or not.

name: Sam Disston
text: Convenient location with friendly staff.

name: Leroy Joseph
text: Great😁

name: Davia Martin
text: Nice facility!!

name: william carlton
text: This place is great!!

name: Greg Tatum
text: ez in and out

name: Liz Allen
text: Great

name: Remy Helu
text: I like those guys

name: William “Russ” Thompson
text: Scam on charges

name: Kevin Nelson
text: Great place

name: Roger Jimenez
text: Good

name: Sapphy121
text: If I could give this location a zero I would. I reserved a truck for a week(wasn’t gonna use the full week/only needed it for a few days)and when I got there the said I could only rent it for 24hrs. I even asked if i could rent it for couple of days and they said no. I couldn’t even rent the other vehicles for more than 24hrs. I don’t understand this policy because people are traveling to different states/cities to move things and to only be able to access it for just 24hrs doesn’t make sense. I made the reservation in a advance I wish they would’ve called me a lot sooner to tell I could only rent for a 24hrs. Instead I had to find out the day I came to pick it up. This location is super unorganized.

name: Bryan Withrow
text: Was in 2 weeks ago to have wire check out on my truck( a different uhaul location in stalled it) the guy that works in the garage was sitting at a desk playing on his phone! Told me to come back next day!! Nothing was in the garage be worked on! My steering pump went out so I couldn’t go back! And no one ever answer the phone there! Showed up today July 5th @1 pm as told come back in 30 minutes someone is at lunch he will look at it then! Came back at 1:30 like I was asked was told they are working on this one that was here!! A hour in a haft still sitting here no one has said one word to me!! Nothing not hey this is taking longer can we schedule it for tomorrow or the next day nothing just still waiting!!!!

name: Brett Walsh
text:
All-in-all your average Uhaul store. 2 stars due to misinformation. I returned the truck to the exact location I found it. 3-400' from where I was supposed to return in. (My fault). When I told the salesperson at the front desk where the truck was parked he told me "Don't worry about it, I'll grab it".

2 days later I received a $17.00 charge for returning the truck to the incorrect location. It would have taken less than 5 minutes for me to return it correctly. Instead of being informed about this potential charge, It was implied that it wouldn't be a big deal.

Anyone reading this, make sure you follow your rental contract to the letter, because customer service and general etiquette are quite unfortunately, not a priority here.

I will not return.

name: A M
text: The manager and staff were extremely helpful in finding me a truck to rent. Everything was done fast when it was picked up and there were no issues. Would definitely use them again.

name: Harold Carrion
text: There were two African Americans guys at the front desk, one texting on the phone while I was talking to him and the other one worthless as well. I had never seen so unprofessional, so poor trained, totally don’t care about customer needs. Please do not come to this location, these two guys are worthless.

name: S. B.
text: CAN I GIVE A BIG ZERO...THE SERVICE PEOPLE DID NOT WEAR MASK, THE PEOPLE OTIS AND HIS HELPER DID NOT WEAR A MASK.  THEY ARE SO INEFFICIENT,  I SAW OTIS NOT CHARGE 2 CUSTOMERS WHO CAME IN WHILE WERE WAITING ON HOLD WTH 1-800-GOUHAUL.  THEY DON'T MAINTAIN THEIR EQUIPMENT OR KEEP THE STORE CLEAN.  THE WEBSITE HAS BEEN TERRIBLE AND THE SERVICE HAS BEEN AWFUL.  I HAVE ATTEMPTED TO RENT A TRUCK TWICE NOW AND IT IS THE WORST MANAGED STORE I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED.  AVOID UHAUL AND ESPECIALLY THIS STORE.

name: Sharon Le
text: The manager was unable to help me with a moving materials purchase I made online and was supposed to be able to pick up in store. Frustrated, I left the store and now am out the cost for materials and have none of them. It was a very frustrating experience from beginning to end.

name: Henry Mitchell
text:
It’s 3/4 2:15 pm
Just got off the phone with a young lady and not only was she rude but she told me it cost $20 PER MILE to rent a pick up!!! That means for me to go to fayette and back, it’ll be like $1,000 dollars. WTH?!

name: Justin Rife
text: We reserved a storage unit online that was supposed to be held for today. We just arrived at the center with a fully loaded car and were told that, even though they had the reservation, they didn't actually hold the unit and were overbooked. They also told us this happens all the time.

name: Zane Farris
text: Staff was very busy but Ken made time to help me and my girlfriend hook up a trailer and test our electronics for it. Only took a little under two hours, great service and a really reasonable price for all that was done for us.

name: Eric Ezell
text: This place is HORRIBLE! DO NOT RENT HERE! My fiance and I got a truck at 9:30 AM, left and loaded the truck up, stopped by a good will station out of town and the truck broke down! We was waiting for 9 HOURS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Kept getting put on hold and dealing with a call center all the way out in Arizona!!! This is ALABAMA not ARIZONA!!!!  Didn't get back until 12AM the next morning! Had to get a tow truck all the way out in Mississippi just to service us! We couldn't even take our items to the storage unit because it was closed by then! Now we have to find another truck rental company to move all of our stuff!! I wish I could rate them 0 stars but at least they didn't charge us for the truck! Never renting Uhaul again!

name: Michael C Scott
text: My day started At 9:30 at Uhaul. I got to my appointment 30 minutes early to give plenty of time for a 90 minute install. I had to call and get someone at 1:30 to pick me up after the installation couldn't be completed in time and had to get another ride back to your establishment. During the install a bracket was removed that was not part of the written instructions. Three factory bolts were removed from that bracket and only one was reinstalled. I picked the bolts up off the floor. The manager Mr. Hall ended up giving me $50 off the price but, made sure the shop got the full install money thus rewarding themselves for a job poorly done. He accused me of raising my voice and I apologized telling him I am hard or hearing and wear hearing aids showing him one. He then stated he was done talking with me and tried to charge me for priority shipping when another clerk had removed the shipping because of late delivery. I informed him of that and he decided he'd best call his employee at home to verify. So, more time waiting... I am very unhappy with your operation. It took an hour and a half to finally settle with Mr. Hall and get out the door with him going into his office and refusing to come out after it had been finished and was waiting on me to pick it up...   Finally, at the end of the transaction I thanked him and stretched out my hand and he refused to shake it. Mr. Hall has a chip on his shoulder that needs to be challenged. I remain unhappy with your service. In the past I have rented storage space for 6 months, rented vehicles to move but that business will go elsewhere. I will be needing storage again but another company that can do the job correctly, that doesn't have an attitude that they were doing me a favor by poor quality work...that other company will get my business. Complained to President -- NO REPLY. THESE PEOPLE DON'T CARE.

name: Emmett Brown
text: In 2017, I was impressed with this location. Now, in 2020, I’m disappointed and will probably stop using the location as my primary. The location is habitually understaffed or poorly staffed. Waiting in line 25 minutes just to reach the counter nullifies any need for an “Express Checkin.”

name: Leona Smith
text: Do not I repeat do not come here for any service. Was quoted a hitch with wiring and when installed was more than quoted and when the home office tried to call them about the price difference the manager would not answer the phone ..... pitiful customer service never again will I do business with them nor refer anybody to them also have been waiting since Tuesday for the home office to call me back NEVER AGAIN  .....DO NOT COME HERE

name: Agent Phrosty
text: Reserved a truck online to pick up at a different local location. On the way to the original site, we checked the order online and noticed that the pickup location had changed to the Skyland location. No big deal... Less than five minutes away. The folks here were very helpful and accommodating  They even offered suggestions to adjust our original reservation which saved us money. In and out in under ten minutes... And returning was just as easy. Will definitely use them again.

name: Cynthia Richardson
text: In my opinion Uhaul is a rip off because if you dont pay your storage fee on due date you will get charged a $15 late fee a day later. Uhaul dont even allow a grace period and they be trying to get every dime. Tony did work with me to get a issue resolved on one occasion but they still can do better as far as working with their customers and allow at least a 5 day grace period b4 a late fee is accessed.

name: Kimberly Grammer
text: This place has the worse customer service I've ever seen! Everytime I come here and I come every month to pay on my storage it takes atleast 30-45 min!! They ignore u and work on cars while u are standing in the store! It's every time! I will be taking my stuff somewhere else ASAP! This place is ridiculous!

name: Q Crews
text: So i reserved a pickup truck, and when i got there, was told by this rude woman that it wasn't a truck rental but a van rental. When i told her that was not the case, she was very rude. I finally settled for a van, then when i ran my card was told they only accepted cards with chips. Kept me waiting 30 minutes with no end result. The woman (i think her name was tammy) was rude, condescending, and was cursing in front of me. She was older, grey long hair, heavy set. The young man at the counter was very helpful even though this woman was making it difficult. Whoever thought hiring her was a good idea is an idiot.

name: James Smith
text: This is the most ridiculous experiwnce i have ever encountered.  Had to park on street when returning u haul and not only that you remt a $19.95 a day rental.  I have the rental for 5 hours and they charge 99 vents a mile on top of that. Highway robbery.   I will never rent from u haul ever again.  Cost for 5 hours. $191.74    OUTRAGEOUS.  NEVER AGAIN.  I hope no one will ever rent from this place.

name: Primetimesha
text: My Husband an i rented with them this Past Saturday, the wait process was average. Paperwork process was easy. My husband reserved a 15' Truck a day ahead of time so they did have it ready. The truck was suppose to be able to hold a 2bdrm apartment but held at least 70% if we had more time we could have crammed everything in it but since we was on a short time frame we jus got what we could. We only had the Uhaul 9hrs an it was $160 something way more than i expected especially being in the moving process. Uhaul was clean. Everything was set up professionally.

name: Sheridan Galyon
text: The absolute worst customer service. I was calling to get quotes and Mary kept trying to get my credit card and rushing me. When I stated for the 3rd time I was just calling for quotes she said, “Thank you for calling I hope you have a great day” and tried to hang up. So I stated again I just needed quotes and I wasn’t done and she seemed very bothered. I work in customer service and Mary was very unprofessional and rude and definitely could use more training.

name: Teresa Jackson
text: I had the most 2 pleasant workers to wait on me this morning that I had to do a review. Thank you so much Taj and Ray for being so professional and Courteous to me as a walk in customer and I will be doing business here again. I truly Thank you both and your kindness is appreciated!!!!

name: Jackie Herron
text: They discovered my bumper was only for stepping up on and it wasn't attached nor strong enough to pull a sm. camper much less one of any size. They helped me with wire the braking system and did a great job and were very friendly and helpful. They helped me find the best rate to go out of state and back. I will be using them again on Easter weekend as well.

name: scott glass
text: Rented from them twice, both times they didnt have what we reserved. Now they are telling me the closest place to pick up what we reserved is 45 minutes away. They were not helpful at all. Hopefully the trailer hitch we got installed by them doesn't break on our trip. I will never use "U-got to get something else" again. They made sure to tell me this isn't their fault and horrible planning its everyone else fault because people are moving out of Tuscaloosa and not in. I will take my money elsewhere and spend more money just so I dont have to deal with this company again. At the end of the conversation I was told " You can either get it or not" They DO NOT CARE about your business.

name: Holly Bagwell
text: Was returning a cargo trailer and the employee wouldn't even help show where to put the trailer or help unhook the trailer. They didn't even give me a receipt showing that I returned the trailer.

They told me they were giving me a 400 mile allowance and would receive my deposit back for a move from Mississippi picking up an rv trailer. They ended up charging 186 extra and demanded I return it before noon the next day despite previously telling me not to worry about it.

name: Becca Tindol
text: Reserved a truck 1 month ahead of time, got there at scheduled pick up time and no truck was available. Said they would call when they had one. 5 hours went by no call. Finally had to go in and get another truck, which I have to return tomorrow. I had a reservation for a truck for 5 days. Now I have to find a place to unload all of my stuff and keep it dry and safe for 5 days because they ruined my reservation. So frustrating, manager was of no help and kept telling me "there's nothing I can do". Will NEVER be using uhaul again. Horrible customer service.

name: Greg Hilton
text: Not sure where the negative comments came from for this U-Haul location but we had a fantastic experience  with these folks. Our vehicle had broke down late Thursday night on the interstate and we had no luck at the rental car company getting a vehicle. We walked to the Uhaul store and everyone there was extremely helpful and very nice to us. We were in and out of the store with a great cargo van that had less than 15000 miles on it. Cold Ac, the works. It even got great gas mileage!! We're EXTREMELY happy with our experience there and will be using this UHaul store again. Thanks to all the folks who work at this store!! You saved us a ton of headaches!! Much Appreciated!!

name: A.T. Smayda
text:
2.5 years as a Moving Helper with Uhaul this Uhaul by far is one of the best I have done business with! Front office staff early morning were respectful and acted like they cared about their job!

Previous comments in here I have chalked it up to people lying or wanting something for free! General Manager was outside checking trucks in! This showed me this place has a team oriented mentality! Will use again for our move down to Florida! Thank You Skyland Uhaul!

name: Stephanie Higgs
text: Great customer service!!! Thanks for everything

name: Jeannie Oakley
text: I posted two stars only because of positive experiences with other U-Haul locations but this one at Tuscaloosa was quite negative.  We booked and paid ahead online for a simple hitch (no wiring).  Because we were driving an hour to this location, we called the day before and asked how long the installation would take.  Having been told only 30 minutes, we took only the one car and planned to wait.  When we got there, the order was wrong, the installer not there and were told it would be 3 hours before the installation could be done  We cancelled and asked for a refund but were told the charge had not been put on our card (it had and it will take 3-5 business days to be credited back).   When I tried to voice my complaint through customer service I got cut off after nearly 20 minutes of telling my story (I think they just hung up because they didn't want to be bothered).  Try #2 went better and I was told the manager would call me.  It's been 3 business days, no call.  We'll find a better option.

name: chasity evans
text: So I️ rented a uhaul on 12/16/18 for the amount of 61.55 and sum change plus 17 dollars for couch covers we got to cover furniture I️ look on my americas first acc today and they have withdrawed more money 42.55 on 12/29 /18 when I’ve already paid the full amount ....I️ will be calling cooperate first thing in the morning to report this.

name: Khari Williams
text: Reserved a truck at 11:00 got there and our truck wasnt there and no other ones were available. We left called and asked if we could get a bigger truck which they assured us was in the lot, got there and they said they couldn't find it.

name: Cheryl Holliday
text: These are the rudest most unprofessional people I have ever encountered.  I have been in the Customer Service industry over 20 years and have never met anyone so rude and smart alecky.  I called in for a price quote on an standard 8' pickup truck and was told the price if using a credit card.  In most rental companies credit cards are not the only form of payments accepted.  I asked the representative what other forms of payments would be accepted and I was told "Well you can't get a pick up truck because you have to have a credit card" in a rude and snotty way.  There was no misunderstanding about the tone and inflections in this young lady's voice.  Their employees definitely need more training  because their customer service skills are horrible.  U HAUL WILL NEVER get my business.

name: Kelly Dean
text: My husband  has spent all day broken down on the side of the road in one of your trucks!  The truck didn't even make it to our house!  He took off work today so we could move and now the day is almost over!  I cannot get anyone from customer service on the phone!  He waited on hold for half an hour just to tell someone he was broken down then he waited another two hours for roadside assistance and now he is waiting on the side of the road for them to fix the truck. The day is almost over and now we can't move. We close on our house in a few days and today was the only day we could move and my husband wasted his off day. U Haul has screwed us royally. I will never do business with this company again!

name: Brian Pierce
text: horrible , simply horrible ...... but all you have to chose from ,so be careful , read evrything , and double check all billing on credit cards!!!

name: Christie Staudhammer
text: We rented there on 9/24/2013 and had a simply horrific experience.  The first truck we took out stalled out several times on the Lurleen Bridge and we returned it (they later said there was nothing wrong with it). The second truck had a faulty fuel gage which did not move when fueling it with over 10 gallons of gas. The owner was completely unwilling to admit anything was wrong with the truck, even though the evidence was staring him in the face.  Moreover, both trucks wreaked of marijuana.  Don't waste your time with these clowns and their poor equipment.

Sent me all the way to McAlla saying that was the closest trailer available.. They were EXTREMELY rude and so unhelpful!!! Save your time and go somewhere else!!!

I went online to find another one and guess which location popped up as having one avaliable? Yep this one. Long story short.. the items I reserved online with the truck were not avaliable (thank God for football playing brothers), they were even ruder the second visit, and they tried to charge me a 2nd day on a truck that was returned an hour early because they didn't look for the truck in their lot.

name: Hugh Kim
text: Haley was very friendly and helpful when I needed a urgent cargo van rental. She did prepare the van quickly, and moreover she did review/explain the contract and hidden fees one by one which may be charged later. I am not sure why some reviews are bad, but it was truly the best U-Haul place I ever visited. When I return the van there was a area black out due to heavy rain, but it waa going smooth with her mobile check out. Recommended.

name: Hayden Lindsey
text: I was up there on Saturday getting propane. This place had horrible service and I would not recommend anybody use the service here. They were not helpful at all to my needs and while I was waiting I overheard the employees talking about how the manager was arrested for drugs. Can not believe that they would let a convict and a drug addict run this place. Horrible overall.

text: Consistently awful service.  Stopped using them.

name: sam miller
text: I was very disappointed with this U-Haul location. My one star rating stems from work not being completed in a timely manner and reluctancy of the operator to remedy a problem. Let me elaborate: my accord was having a trailer hitch installed and the installation took over 4 hours! This is obviously irksome but the worst part was that the operator installing the hitch seemed unenthusiastic about fixing the root cause, which was that the u bolt broke. Thankfully she drove over to the other U-Haul in town to get another part, but didn't readily offer to do that. Instead, she tried to put off the installation to the next day. I would avoid this location!

Every rep seemed like they had no idea what i was talking about.. then all of a sudden uhaul tells us that they JUST changed our reservation location to Lagrange at 5:45 without notfying us or asking if that was okay while we're STILL sitting in the valley location.. Only bright side is we got our $50 reserve guarantee back.

text: This uhual consistently has rude customer service. My friend and I ( we are black men) we’re next in line to get service and the lady helping us (she white) looked over us and tried to help the white man behind us. Thankfully he declined her service until we were helped but the fact that she even did that was upsetting.

name: Taylor M
text: If looking for a U-haul in the Huntsville area, use this location! The staff is very friendly, helpful, and will assist with any questions you may have.

name: Kyle Brewington
text:
They do not inspect their vehicles before they rent them out. I rented a truck from them, and when I got back to our apartment it was spewing coolant from an obviously busted radiator. I tried to call the 1-800 number which nobody answered. I tried to call the store and nobody answered. We drove back up there and they said that they couldn't answer the phones because they were too busy. When I told them the truck had broken down, they said I would just have to wait for a response to the service request. Finally after an hour and a half, it said someone was looking into it. They sent a repairman out, who immediately said that it would have to be towed. They had told him it was a small leak, even though I had attached a picture showing a pool of coolant underneath the truck. I put the service request in at 10:30 AM, and it took until 3:30 PM for the tow truck driver to finally show up to get the truck. This company, and this location in particular has zero customer service.

Edit: Woke up this morning to a receipt for $415.53 for a rental of 7 days and 21 miles. My apartment was less than 3 miles from the rental facility. I am currently working with customer service to get a refund, which has to be done through the location I rented the vehicle from.

Edit 2: After talking to customer service and a worker at the store, I got a refund.

name: Sheila
text: Horrible! Greed! I dropped off van but couldn’t wait because my Lyft arrived to take me back home. Tammy Davis told me I could sign in on line. What I didn’t know, which was a confusing process, was that I needed to take a picture of odometer, etc. I took a Lyft back to UHaul at 4400 University Drive to confirm I returned van in on time. I’m glad I asked for a copy of my contract after a guy on his cell behind counter told me no worries he checked me in. I asked for contract and he said he didn’t do that part of the job. (???) But you just told me you checked me in. 🧐 I cannot believe I was told I spilled liquid in the van and was charged $25 for not cleaning the back mat when I only had 13 medium boxes of books totally sealed with wrapping plastic. They got me! I wish I knew the Lyft driver could’ve waited, I would’ve stayed in line to confirm checkout. What a scam!!!

name: victor stewart
text: This location is extremely slow, I’ve never gotten a propane tank refill here that took less than 45 minutes. I will not be returning. By the way the customer service is trash as well.

text: Customer service there is horrible.Go somewhere else to spend your hard earned money. Stood right there as she walked away and helped a white customer as if I was not important. If you can’t respect me do expect my money.

text: This store provides the best service you can get in uhaul. I've been at many uhaul locations across the US and this one is the best. Justin has amazing customer service and trains his staff that way as well. I drive all the way across town to get rentals from this location because of the service. I've rented trucks, trailers and had all the wiring for my trailers completed at this location.

I was informed that I spoke to the people at the call center and not the actual location. So I went to this Huntsville location and the guys here was amazing!! All 3 helped me when something went wrong. Awesome communication and teamwork. I would definitely recommend this location.

We are moving to California and went to this uhaul location to rent a trailer. Since day one we were treated super nice and friendly when we had the hitch and bar installed. Next day went to get the trailer and Willow helped us out with that she was super cool! She made sure we had the correct ball for the trailer to hook up and was very helpful overall.. they have alot of trailers to choose from and everything is on point.
Great experience so far.

The put more fuel in it than it had when I got it. It's all over when they get your card number. They are just dishonest!!

text: I needed my old wiring removed and new wiring put on, Willow knew exactly what to do and was fast. She is awesome.  I highly recommend her and this store.

name: Bob Pietrs
text: Very good.  Very nice truck.  Great people.  ONE CAUTION:  If you rent a truck, rent it for the WHOLE day.  If you rent it for a short period and find out later that your move is taking too long, u haul can charge you a $50 inconvenience fee (inconvenient to the next scheduled renter) plus an additional rental period fee (like $29).  The reason for this, is that the local u-hauls try to schedule the truck for several customers in one day, so if you go beyond your stated rental period, you face the extra fees!  U-HAUL DOES NOT TELL YOU THIS UP FRONT.

name: Faith
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. We check in online so there was very little wait before we were on our way.

name: John Smith
text: I had to fill two 100lb and one 20lb propane tanks today. My only vehicle is a car. I loaded up the tanks into my hatch lying down. When I arrive at the facility, they inform me that they cannot fill my tanks if they enter the property lying down. I had no one available with a truck to meet me across the street. You also cannot park across the street and carry them upright onto the property. I had to drive my car across the road, rent a uhaul truck, drive across the road in the truck, load them upright in the bed of the truck, and then I had to bring them onto the property to fill them before doing everything in reverse order. Also, if you have any adapters on the 100lb tanks which make it slower to fill, they won't allow you to borrow any tools to remove the adapter (adjustable/ crescent wrench). Which means, I only got one of my 100lb tanks filled, because they didn't want to hassle with the adapter on the second one. While I did get two of my three tanks filled, it took entirely too much time and effort to simply fill a few propane tanks.

name: Jennifer Hallinan
text: Ordered a trailer hitch to hang a bike rack off of my car from this Uhaul location. 6 days later it was in and i dropped my car off to have it installed. 5 hours later they called to say they couldn't put it on because they didn't have all the parts. Really???? i order them. you said they were in. And for this I had to leave my car for 5 hours to then not get my hitch put on and told i would have to wait again.  Manager there was extremely rude to me and told me there was nothing he could do for me and proceeded to not only smirk at me but to laugh at me in front of other employees and customers. A paying customer should NEVER be treated this way. we ARE the reason you are in business. DO NOT go here, they are clueless!!!!!

name: saLina Kee
text:
Corey kagel was so helpful.. he went above and beyond with customer service. While in the facility, Tyne other workers continually ask him questions and to do things for them.  He never  lost his good attitude it got flustered
And when my truck adoring was messed up, he actually went anf got s tool box and fixed it for me.  Great example of customer service and has my loyalty.  I will use the facility again for my uhaul needs because of such outstanding service!

name: Matthew Self
text: I just wanted to contact you to let you know of my experience with two different U-Haul locations in Huntsville, AL on Dec. 31, 2015.  It was such a bad experience that I will never use U-Haul again.  On Dec. 30, 2015 I reserved a pickup truck for rental the following day at the location at 3713 Governor's Drive in Huntsville.  I was scheduled to pick this vehicle up at 11:30am.  I showed up a few minutes early and the location was empty.  A few minutes later, Tammy, the General Manager comes in from the back and informs me that my reservation has been moved to the location across town at 4400 University Drive in Huntsville.  I needed to have the truck in a certain location to pick up some furniture by noon of that day and this was already placing me behind schedule considering that I was never notified in advance of this change.  A few minutes later I arrive at the location on University Drive to attempt my pick up.  While waiting in a line of 5 people, I start to become stressed because it is already 11:45am.  The General Manager at this location, Paulette Boehlke, informs me that it doesn't matter when I was scheduled to pick up this truck.  She states, that I will have to wait in line while she continues taking peoples orders and then going outside to fit them for their truck.  I am a bit in a panic because this is not what I expected considering that I had reserved the truck for a specific pick up time for a reason.  I finally left the location because I could not see it fit to pay U-Haul for the poor job they had done with having my reservation ready for pick up that morning.  All this especially considering they have a sign in office guaranteeing that they will have the truck you order at the right location at the right time available for you.  I cancelled my order with U-Haul and was able to reserve a truck with another moving company.  Tammy, from the first location called while I was on the way to pick up the new truck and tried to get me to come by and pick up a truck that was now there at her location on Governor's Drive.  She claimed that the reason I couldn't pick up the truck at the scheduled time and scheduled location was because the call center had double booked that time.  The pick up that was sitting outside her location when I was their earlier, she said, had been left by someone that had not left their keys with her.  Either way, the whole thing was crap.  I intend to never use U-Haul's services again and will inform people of this issue in the Huntsville locations.

name: madison young
text: About the slowest possible service.  employees are friendly and nice enough,  but apparently there aren't enough of them. standing in a line of 7 to 8 people for over 20 minutes while one or two guys run back and forth to trucks is pretty ridiculous.

text: I rented a trailer from this place. I didn't check the tire pressure until after I had loaded the trailer and done some highway driving. It was about 50 PSI with the tire still hot when it was supposed to be 70 PSI cold. It was stupid to trust these people and I'm glad I didn't have a blowout. Won't be back.

Second they didn't have the reservation for the time I reserved it for and so I took off from work for nothing because I could not get the U-Haul until the next day. I am currently disputing the bill and complaining about the terrible indifferent attitudes displayed by the staff and I'm getting the run around from the manager. If you are decent and organized with no time to waste...DONT USE THIS LOCATION

name: Adam Bertagnolli
text:
(Updated after finding issues) Every time I step in this place, they are packed like the DMV and never have enough employees to handle it for 1 reason or another.  Today, I took my vehicle in for a tow hitch at 8am.  It was only supposed to take a few hours.  It ended up taking them until 2pm to finish it, because they kept taking the installer off the job to handle the crowd.  You should have a separation of concerns when running a business.  That installer should've been able to focus on his work instead of having constant distractions.  In that time, he managed to somehow run my battery dead.  After I finally hooked a 5x8 trailer up, I found out that the hitch was slanted towards the ground, making it impossible to use a trailer.  I ended up having to have the movers who were moving most of my stuff take everything, but the stuff they couldn't take (i.e. aerosols, propane, gas cans, etc) which caused my move to take longer and cost more.  My muffler also was rattling against the hitch which was very annoying.  I finally got to my destination and had the hitch uninstalled, and and a full refund was made.  However, the installer at my new destination found damages made to my vehicle from the initial install.  So, now I"m going to have to take it to my dealership for repairs, which will be getting paid for by UHaul's claim agency.  If only all the time that I put into this whole ordeal could be compensated too!

My 2nd issue was that my calls to check the status were being routed to their corporate office who kept claiming they were unable to give any status on my install, and they discouraged me from directing my call to the location, claiming they probably wouldn't answer.  Corporate customer service sucks basically.  What they should've done was figure out what was going on with it instead of just leaving me out in the dark, which basically forced me to drive back down there and wait on it.

Also, don't buy boxes from these people.  In order to get the "discounted" rate, you have to buy them by the bundle.  I put quotes on "discounted", because Home Depot sells them individually for the same price...actually, cheaper.  Plus you can get an additional 5% discount if you have a Home Depot credit card.

name: Poseidon Master
text:
I have visited U-hauls throughout the Shoals area and in many different states and I can now conclusively say that Karah at this location is bar none the best manager at any U-haul location that I have visited in over 15 years of having rented from U-haul.  She consistently goes out of her way to ensure that the customer has a pleasant experience and a smooth transaction with no task being considered too lowly for a manager to perform doing everything from skillfully handling U-hauls computer systems in record time, to even offering to help me to hook up a trailer in the rain!  If U-haul does not promote her to the corporate team soon, it will be a huge mistake on their part.

I also have to mention Britney at this location who I have known for just a little less time than Kara.  Britney goes above and beyond in every transaction to see to it that my rental is in tip top shape and consistently has been first on the scene to help me to unhitch my trailer as soon as I arrive.  Brittney has the skills the knowledge, the personality to keep this location running like a greased wheel as a manager when Kara is promoted to corporate so U-haul what are you waiting for.

I will have to recruit both of these amazing workers myself if your team doesn't choose quickly to make use of their amazing potential. I would consider the customer service at this U-haul location with these two team members to be the absolute best in the entire Shoals area. They are both a shining example of the customer service that this town is so desperately lacking.  It is rare to stumble across one worker like Brittney who enjoys what she does and does it well, it is even more rare to find a manager like Kara who does the same all while maintaining a productive and pleasant workplace for her team!

When you visit this place, tell them Lee sent you!

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer, Karah and Brittany  of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama truly thank you for taking your valuable move time to not only award the highest 5 star experience rating for "over the to", consistent customer service in meeting your UHUAL needs in a rapid, accurate manner, but for your kind comments regarding honest, helpful customer care in a productive, pleasant environment assisting you in unhitching your trailer as soon as you arrive at the facility. name: Sarah Adkins-Jablonsky
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given.

Uhaul cancelled without our notice and did not care, leaving us in the cold

We rented a 15 ft truck weeks before a cross city move from this Vestavia location. The day before, we got a call saying the pick up location was at True Value in Helena AL. When we get there, the True Value reps said it was not available due to a mishap with another customer and to call to find a location where we could pick up our truck. When we called the Vestavia store to find out truck, they said our reservation had been cancelled. When? By whom? They could not tell us (????) but said there was a cancellation email (but we never received an email— our emails only tell us to go to TrueValue). So we are left without a truck and without an apology.

When we try to make a new reservation, the closest option was a 30ft truck a 3 hour round trip away.

U-Haul permanently lost a customer.

name: Krista Bell
text: The employee we saw at pickup was very nice. Per our contract, we rented the uhaul from 5:30pm to 8:30pm, but this kind employee told us we could turn it in before opening the next day (7am). We returned at 6:45am, and Sabrina was very rude and charged us for 2 days. (We only had the uhaul for 12 hours.) When I explained the situation, she just kept stating to “read the contract”. I’m aware of what the contract said as I made the reservation, but when an employee tells me differently, I take their word. Very disappointed.

name: Louis Gobeo
text: Outstanding service. The day I visited, the manager was working through an issue with their alarm. Despite what was surely a stressful situation, she provided prompt and courteous service and bent over backwards to help us out with our rental. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you!

text: Friendly service and was everything i needed! Will only rent from this location in the future! Top notch business!

name: Bill Pesnell
text: I have rented from this location numerous times. Without fail, and consistent on each and very rental, the manager Sabrena, and the staff have been polite, extremely helpful, open to suggestions, and overall, a joy with which to work. Not once have I ever had an issue. I would recommend that potential new customers overlook the one-off bad review because everyone has a bad day now and then. Big picture, Sabrena and the crew will bend over backwards to help any way they can. I will not rent from any other vendor or location if at all possible. Five Star service without a doubt.

name: Justin Hardy
text: I needed a dolly on short notice, Sabrena and her crew came through with flying colors. She was extremely courteous and very personable. I'll definitely be coming back to her for any future needs.

text: The worker Paul  at this location lied about a free month when he overheard me and my sister talking about taking our things to another storage facility because they have a 1 month free promotion and he says so do we now fast forward a month later and I have late fees and liens in my property because he lied. You can never get anyone on the phone no matter what time of day it is. Also I have called corporate several times spoke with someone named David Reed who was very short and nasty because he kept saying you have to call the store and speak with them when I explained that no one is on the office when I get off at 6. Even though I was told they are there until 7. So I was told on Thursday that he would call me back by 1:00 that day to discuss this (remind you this is the guy who lied to me.) Still haven't spoke with the manager at this facility and I thinks it's because they know they messed up. So for 3 weeks I have been given the run around and still no district manager or nothing. I will say this how ever it turn out from thus point I WILL NOT NOR WILL I RECOMMEND THIS UHAUL COMPANY TO ANYONE! Now the lie is it's only if you are moving one way (BUT WHO MOVES OUT OF STATE AND PUT THERE THINGS IN A STORAGE IT MAKES NO DENSE AT ALL!!!!!) Save your time and money and go to another place. The manager at the location up the street is worse his name is Antonio. Don't know why any of these people got into customer service cause clearly they are not cut out for this job. They say you pay for what you get so buyer beware this is what I got lesson learned that's for sure!!!!!!!

text: Worst customer service I have ever seen anywhere.  Had a scheduled appointment with them to install a hitch at 9:00. This was the first available spot two weeks ago. Did arrive 30 min late. Girl at counter was nice and said it would be ready in approximately 1.5 hours. Left it for 2.5 hours and came back. Car has not been touched. I drove an hour to get there and an hour home. Wrecked half a day. Asked for a full refund. Asked for the manger and he yelled at me, saying “we call you when ready”. I asked was it complete and he yelled “does it have a hitch on it?”  He didn’t know or care and walked outside to see. I asked for the contact info of his manager. I called him and all he said was we let you down and I will talk to manager. They should have put the car on the rack, and knocked it out and offered some sort of discount. I leave on vacation tomorrow so no hitch, no trailering. I wouldn’t spend a dime here ever again, and it’s no wonder there rating is so low here and on y e l p.

name: Rose Keith
text: Dropped off a 26 foot uhaul truck in Florala, AL on a Wednesday at 343pm.  Hours stated that they close at 4pm and I had called earlier to notify them that I was dropping the truck off that day and to verify that they had room for the dropoff of the big trunk. The app wouldn't locate the location of the uhaul place so we were unable to checkout through the app. We dropped the keys off in the 24 hour box and drove back to a northern state to finish packing up what didn't fit in the 26 foot. We got a 15 foot truck, loaded it up and returned back down south. I noticed that the 26 foot reservation did not close out online. I called and talked with guy over the phone. He said that he had closed it out, but I told him that it wasn't showing as closed out. They closed out the 26 foot uhaul on the last day of reservation at  the exact hour that it was due back. The store isn't even open that day.  I received a notification for tolls for the 26 uhaul yet I picked up a 15 foot uhaul the same day in Virginia. There is no way to be in two places at once. I mileage on both trucks should have been the same as they were driven to the same location.  The 26 foot uhaul had additional mileage on it from somewhere else, but because the date that the reservation was closed out on I had to pay for the tolls. The whole reason I made a big deal about constantly calling uhaul was because I needed a copy of the receipt so that I can get reimbursed for the move due to work. We will NEVER use uhaul again because of this and do not recommend them when businesses can't even be trusted to close out reservations when equipment is returned.  I am active duty military and I will recommended to all my fellow service members not to use this service.

name: Renee Martin
text:
Fraudulent warranty. IF this place still sells Graceland buildings. DO NOT BUY!
We purchased a shed 3 yrs ago. You can even call the business directly and their hold messages promise top quality craftsmenship. We told them the day we bought it that we were purchasing this to pay floor, put walls, heating and air, and create an apartment type space for my son. We were reassured and “sold” on the quality promised and the guarantee of it they stood by with their warranty. Since buying the building for $10,000 cash 3 yrs ago, we have had two leaking doors everytime it rains for 3 straight yrs. we have utilized the warranty each time. After the 4th or 5th time of having them try and fix it (we were promised a FIX not an attempt at a fix) we said we wanted our money back. We cannot lay floor over wet floor to be ruined. The entire operation has been halted for three whole YEARS waiting on this promised fixed. We were told to give them one more chance by completely replacing the inward swinging doors with outward swinging doors. If they did not fix it, they promised they would discuss with me a possible refund or partial refund. Even a 50% refund would allow us to have a porch made. At this point however, a 50% refund keeps me connected to a crooked company. They replaced the doors and the next rain came and it was still leaking. We took pictures each time of course. So I called in about the promised conversation about a refund. I was transferred to a lady who took my number and would call me back, and I never heard from her. In the mean time they were sending out (same repair man each time) the repair man to “fix” it for the 5th ish time. So he did, well I just went out there and it’s a soggy soaking wet mess again. This will be the SECOND time since what they called their “last resort” by replacing the doors. They basically told me if that didn’t fix it nothing would. So I have a 10,000 box in my yard. Even the mattresses we placed out there are now ruined from the leaking doors and had to be thrown away. I’m unable to use it. I called again today and they wanted to come “fix” it even tho they told me they had done everything they can. These floors in my opinion need to be replaced now by the doors if they’re going to keep it leaking. I didn’t pay for floors exposed to rain for 3 solid yrs. I asked again anout a refund and was told because the building is as old as it is, they can’t do anything about it. Well, it’s only as old as it is because they kept telling me they’d fix it. I’ve been kind and patient for 3 YRS! If they can’t stand by their written warranty statement to fix and REPAIR (not bandaid) the issue of THEIR building THEY built, the I deserve a refund! When you buy a car and the engine blows each time it’s replaced, you get another car under a warranty or a refund. It’s called a lemon at some point. They’re refuse to work with me.

name: tyler valentine
text: I reserved an auto transport from another U-haul dealer nearby. I showed up at the dealer with my truck loaded ready to move to Texas around 3:30 pm and they had the wrong auto transport. I called the hub for U-haul dealers and they pointed me to this dealer because he had it in stock. I frantically drove over to try and get there before he closes so I didn't have to wait till the next day to move. Not only did this dealer stay open late to help me load my truck on the auto transport, but he advised me that my trailer hitch was un safe and that I should probably get the correct ball for the hitch at Autozone. He stayed open after hours to wait for me while I picked up the correct ball and hitch from Autozone. When I arrived, he tightened the ball down on the hitch for me. Once we got the trailer on my truck, he guided my other truck on the auto transport and tied everything down for me. After a quick walk around to make sure everything was safely tied down, he gave me his card and said to give him a call if I had any trouble down the road because he knows how hard it can be to get help from U-haul's operators. I had never met this man before I moved that day, but he treated me like his neighbor and displayed true southern hospitality.

name: Paula Rounds
text: Reasonable and very nice.

name: Clifford Crossen
text: Good people

name: Shy Marie
text:
They’re driver almost caused a 4 car collision today.  Traffic is headed straight and he is in the far right lane    He suddenly decides he wants to turn left and forces himself into my lane as traffic is speeding up in my lane and almost hits the car in front of me, and the car in the left turning lane and made me nearly crash into the side of the truck, yes he was turning so sharply he was horizontal  in between me
And the car in front of me . I call to report several times. No answer.

text: Wonderful experience with renting a truck. The mileage is less expensive than other truck rental places and the truck was in great shape and easy to drive. The staff was extremely nice and helpful with questions. I highly recommend using this company for your moving needs.

text: Definitely going to Uhaul next time. The man at the front desk was very dry while processing my information to lease the truck. Upon returning it, I waited over half an hour for them to open despite me going during "operation hours". Not very good customer service but the best financial choice.

name: Josh Greenwald
text: Lowering my review because they deleted my first one. The shady rep at this location gave me a grand speech about how I’d be liable for up to $350,000 to a replace a 15’ box truck if I damaged it because I declined coverage (which is absolutely ridiculous, the liability is up to $42,500), just to charge me coverage anyway.

text: The lady working here when I picked up my trailer had a horrible personality (6:30 pm on a Saturday). She was very rude and dismissive. The man working was very nice, though. The lady did my paperwork and the man went out in the rain to help me hook up the trailer.

name: Brenda Robinson
text: I spoke with Brad last week and he ordered wiring for my car hitch.  I spoke with him yesterday afternoon and he set an appointment for today at 4pm to install. I walk in at 10 minutes before 4pm. I tell the man at the counter I have an appointment at 4pm to install wiring. His words and I quote.. I DON'T SEE THAT HAPPENING TODAY.  He then starts texting and I ask him to contact Brad who I set the appointment with. He said that he was texting him that Brad was at a  meeting. By this time I was angry   .  I called CTU down the road and they will have my stuff in tomorrow and install tomorrow afternoon.. I told the guy at the uhaul counter I would not need their service and  I was taking my business elsewhere.  He did not even seem to care.  I suggest a lesson in customer service

text: I came in for a problem and left with the same problem still persisting. When I contacted the boss he told me if the problem persists come Monday he will talk to me about a refund, I ended up breaking down that day and needing a tow and when I called back they refused to give a refund.

name: Brenna Taylor
text:
I had reserved a truck in brewton, however, I was routed to this location as brewton did not have the truck I needed.
A man came to the door, I introduced myself and that I was there for a u-haul. I then dealt with a woman, who asked if I would be returning the truck to this location. I stated no, I would be returning it to brewton. She gave me keys with a "one way truck" keychain.
It was uncomfortable picking up the truck from this location, as I was standing in the living room of these people's home. Laundry was going, an audiobook was playing and it was awkward.

Later that day, I returned the truck to the brewton location and was done with it. This was Saturday.
It's now Monday. I received a call from the husband, asking when I was going to return the truck. I explained that I had returned it the same day to brewton, as I had told his wife. He told me if I did not return the truck, that I would be charged $400! And was very rude! It is their mistake, according to brewton and has been handled now. But POOR SERVICE from this location!

I Recommend Her Assistance to anyone who needs U Haul Service in or departing from Atmore, Alabama.
“KUDOS and ACCOLADES to THELMA”

I turned the truck in 2 days early but by the time it was checked in by this dealer, the time had expired,  giving no chance for a credit.

name: Terry Hanson
text:
We rented the 17' Layton travel trailer for nearly a month and had a wonderful time. It's lightweight and easy to pull with our Nissan Frontier. It is adorable and we got several compliments from others about it. It has been redone inside as well and shows great thoughtfulness and attention to the amenities.
We enjoyed ourselves so much we decided to buy our own small travel trailer.
As a possible place to visit,  check out Oak Mountain State Park. It's in the middle of town in Birmingham, but you would never know it. There are so many activities available for outdoor enthusiasts. OR just hang out at your campsite with this cute little trailer.
The owner, Bradley was great to work with. Any time I reached out to him (before, during and after our rental time) he was always responsive and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you Terry! It was a pleasure to rent to you. I was low-key jealous of your cross-country trip, and was glad to know y'all had a great time.

resp.text: We are so sorry for your inconvenience.  We are now under new management.  All roofs are new and/or coated with elastomeric coating.  We wish you the best and hope you will give us another change in the near future.

name: Lesia Bell
text: We had already set up to have a 10 foot , but when we got there to pick up  ,we were informed it was not available for the time we needed.  The lady was very rude. We would not recommend  to anyone.

resp.text: We are sorry about this Lesia. We are not Uhaul corporate only a dealer site that works off of truck rental commissions.  We are just an intermediary.  Uhaul corporate took our truck that was supposed to be rented to you from our place of business.  Unfortunately, that is sometimes out of our hands if Uhaul leaves us no equipment to rent.  We are asking for your forgiveness.  The truck was simply not available even though it showed in our system it was available.  We wish you the best.

text: I have stored with Huntsville Lock and storage for over a year. I can't tell you how accommodating and helpful their staff is! If you are considering a storage facility CHOOSE THIS LOCATION! name: Amy Crabtree
text: A great place to store your stuff. Very helpful staff!

name: David King
text: I've been a long term tenant that pays annual rent in advance. Since Huntsville Lock Storage has taken over, my unit price has increased twice. Both increases came on my anniversary renewal date. The new owners have only been in place for 1 1/2 years. When I questioned the price increases I was told that it was an industry standard and due to operating expenses and improvements made to the property. Thanks for the second exit gate and the gravel drives with pot holes. One of the main reasons for moving to the previous Winchester Road Storage was that I was guaranteed a unit price that would never increase, as long as I was long term and paid in advance.  Randy was more about business relationships than the all mighty dollar. The new  owners would be wise to follow this principle.
